message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you is even greater. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects a strategic midpoint between my valuation and your perceived worth, aiming to create a mutually beneficial transaction. I trust that this proposal will be favorable to you and look forward to discussing the details further. Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product.
